description:
Montreal, Jan. 21, 2013 - Alexandre Bourget presents Ansible, an open-source software platform for configuring and managing computers.

Useful links:
* Ansible: http://ansible.cc/ + /redirect?event=video_description&v=up3ofvQNm8c&q=http%3A%2F%2Fen.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FAnsible_%28software&redir_token=p_9SqIrRsGVQJql3wRzRk_mumih8MTUwNzc1NDE1OEAxNTA3NjY3NzU4)

* MP34: http://montrealpython.org/2013/01/mp34/

* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: System provisioning with Ansible -- a live demo #MP34
